DOC.brief_summary: A study in which two groups of patients will be analysed; patients converted from Prograf to Advagraf within the first 3 months after transplantation and patients converted from Prograf to Advagraf between 3 months and 1 year after transplantation.
DOC.brief_title: A Multicenter Study in Liver Transplant Patients Converted From Prograf速 to Advagraf速 During the First Post-transplantation Year
DOC.criteria: Patient with a liver transplant performed in the previous year and for whom the conversion from Prograf速 to Advagraf速 was decided by the physician. Patient participating in an interventional clinical trial at the time of enrolment into the study.
